9 Best Developer Communities On Discord

Discord servers to learn programming.

Posted September 19, 2022 1 min read

This article was originally posted on Medium. If you prefer reading it from there, please do check it out.

Benefits of being part of a developer community are a lot, you get to,

  • interact with likeminded people
  • know about recent technologies & tools
  • showcase your work
  • ask your doubts

1️⃣  ZeroToMastery

👑 Admin: Andrei Neagoie

🏢 Members: 259,859+

📝 This was the first dev discord community that I joined. They even have there own online courses about most of the technologies. ZTM Community Discord. Learn Together, Grow Together. | Zero To Mastery

Join ZeroToMastery Discord Server!

2️⃣  The Programmer’s Hangout

👑 Admin: @itsHobbes

🏢 Members: 108,263+

📝 This server is about everything related to coding, and is a good place to interact with other developers.

Join The Programmer’s Hangout Discord Server!

3️⃣  Reactiflux

👑 Admin: @reactiflux

🏢 Members: 172,474+

📝 This server is specifically for React and technologies related to it like TypeScript, Gatsby, nextjs, etc.

Join the Reactiflux Discord Server!

4️⃣  EddieHub

👑 Admin: Eddie Jaoude

🏢 Members: 4,975+

📝 I joined this server to get into the Open Source Community and learn everything related to it

Join the EddieHub Discord Server!

5️⃣  Community Classroom

👑 Admin: @kunalk

🏢 Members: 34,131+

📝 I joined this server as the admin of this server teaches everything related to programming for free.

Join the Community Classroom Discord Server!

6️⃣  TeamTanay Community

👑 Admin: Tanay Pratap

🏢 Members: 19,948+

📝 This server is not just about programming, the admin of this talks about business, Metaverse and NFTs too.

Join the #TeamTanay Community Discord Server!

7️⃣  The Coding Den

👑 Admin: greenbigfrog

🏢 Members: 93,632+

📝 This server is about JavaScript, Python, Machine Learning, UI/UX, etc.

Join the The Coding Den Discord Server!

8️⃣  DevCord

👑 Admin: lost.design

🏢 Members: 33,432+

📝 This server is mostly about JavaScript and Python. This one is also pretty useful if you are looking for collaborators.

Join the devcord Discord Server!

9️⃣  Coding & Programming Community

👑 Admin: Matthew Upham

🏢 Members: 32,512+

📝 This server literally covers everything related to programming, like Web, Games, App, Cybersecurity, ML, etc.

Join the Coding & Programming Community - mattupham Discord Server!

.
